name: chemistry-uno
description: 一个将化学知识融入的创意卡牌游戏

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.update: cd server && npm update && cd ../client && npm update
scripts.audit: cd server && npm audit && cd ../client && npm audit
scripts.audit-fix: cd server && npm audit fix && cd ../client && npm audit fix
